abstract: Movie theater chain AMC Entertainment Inc. set a price range for its planned initial public offering that would yield hefty investment gains to the five private equity firms that control it. AMC, based in Kansas City, Mo., said it expects to offer 39.47 million shares priced between $18 to $20 a share. Assuming a price of $19 a share, the midpoint of the anticipated price range, AMC will have an initial market cap of $2.8 billion.
lead_paragraph: Movie theater chain AMC Entertainment Inc. set a price range for its planned initial public offering that would yield hefty investment gains to the five private equity firms that control it. AMC, based in Kansas City, Mo., said it expects to offer 39.47 million shares priced between $18 to $20 a share. Assuming a price of $19 a share, the midpoint of the anticipated price range, AMC will have an initial market cap of $2.8 billion.

headline.main: AMC I.P.O. Could Net Windfall for Owners
